title: Downtown Salem, Parking, Laundry, Walk to T
neighborhood: Downtown Essex Street next to the Museum
posting_body: Immaculate one bedroom in downtown Salem with private well-lit parking adjacent to the rear door.
Quiet building with no one above.
some people work from home.
New laminate floors.
Large windows.
Bath has tub and shower.
Coffee shop on the first floor.
Located between the Museum and Hawthorne Hotel.
Leave your car in the parking lot and walk to a great Salem restaurant or pub, shop, the T, Pickering Wharf and Salem Commons.
Patio and bike rack.
Cat or small dog possible.
Laundry in building.
Landlord pays real estate agent's fee.
No application fee.
Last month's rent can be paid over three months.
$2350/month.
Tenant pays gas heat, electrical and cable.
Security deposit is $1850 without a pet; $2350 with a pet.
Must have good credit.
Call or text the Property Manager:  Jared McBride,  978-799-4230
